column5: Kijiji/charter boat ad LOL....  Made arrangements for a viewing of my boat+water test,  meet the potential  buyer at  the town launch to take the boat out for a ride. As I arrive I am greeted by two guys with rods in hand standing around their hitchless honda civivc(wonder how they were taking the rig home)  . Quote of the night........"you mind if we fish for awhile??"  Now if this deal had been brokered through a board such as this I may of been in, but REALLY who does that LOL. Anyways figured it would be good for a laugh or two  R
There are jerks everywhere, and more since the kijiji type sites have existed. Comes with the territory
wow.....incredible!!!....to waste your time like that...i wouldve been livid!!!!but i guess ya have to stand back and laugh a bit...
Answer: "Not at all that will be $60 per person per hour in advance"
That was easy to figure out. They wanted to make sure your boat can catch fish.
but...but...but....when my boat was broken that's how I got my fishing in.......   LOL   I can't believe someone would do that

I could go on and on about the crap from KIJIJI. It,s a joke.  Im putting my boat down at the marina this weekend. It,s Kempnfest longweekend. Maybe it will go.   If not,Im rigg,n it up.frigit  Did my own edit .
Brutal hey Brian, I think mine just turned into a waterfowl boat!
Yep all you can do is laugh, I have a funny feeling my face said it all though LOL!
I would have said 'Sure!' after they handed over a nice fat deposit.
Hey Ryan.were headed to my parents place Friday and Sat,but back for sunday AM if you want to go out with the kiddies and wife. Just bring PFD,s.

In that case can I see your boat sometime in October?  Maybe we'll bring the guns?????  I've never heard of that happening before, insane.  I have sold two boats and both of them I have sold to members here on the board.  Sadly neither time we had time to go fishing.
That's crazy and I thought the couple no show's I had were bad should have took them out and dropped em off on a island
So... what did you tell those goofs?

Never been a good poker player, kinda wear my emotions on my face, and I think they read em pretty good. literally laughed in their faces, and asked what they were towing the boat with. After a few min of small talk it was obvious there was no intention to purchase the boat thus no water test. I should have launched right as they were leaving LOL.
Thanks, would love to but we're headed North on that day, should be a great day on the water though.
That is unreal !! ... nothing surprises me anymore
